item.title: Downloads
item.description: The Latest Release version is 3.2.2, released December 7, 2014 See the changelog for a list of changes. Type Notes File MD5 OS X Full Install Aegisub-3.2.2.dmg 913e07d6483dcea627c3706584c9d95d Source aegisub-3.2.2.tar.xz d80e852c34811add358c06d77f5cd40d Windows Regular Install (32-bit) Aegisub-3.2.2-32.exe 7717d85ebb15ee3a2b30e3271068fa0f Windows Regular Install (64-bit) Aegisub-3.2.2-64.exe 3cb95e30c73b7a227a4590b0cd986ddb Windows Portable (32-bit) aegisub-3.2.2-portable-32.exe 908016606d64c52ef52b52a3704fc1b2 Windows Portable (64-bit) aegisub-3.2.2-portable-64.exe d316e4ce9bcbfb53d3803c86804c3f69 Upcoming Versions # Check CI build Dictionaries # To cut down on the download size, the Windows “Full” Install includes only a US English dictionary for the spell checker.
